context_of_use: This use case allows both customers and admins to view and download reports for monitoring performance.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: access to reports for personal analysis
admin: ability to monitor business performance through sales reports
description: Allow admins and customers to view sales and other reports to monitor performance.
preconditions: User has permission to view reports.
postconditions: User successfully views the requested reports.
User can download reports if needed.
assumptions: Users have valid accounts to access the reporting system.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to view reports.
The system shall allow users to download reports.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for viewing.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to view reports → System displays available reports.
2. Admin requests to view sales reports → System displays sales reports.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): If the customer selects a specific report, then the system displays the detailed report view.
AF-2 (from Step 2): If the admin selects a specific sales report, then the system displays the detailed sales report view.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the user is not authenticated, then the system prompts the user to log in.
